divs: Sighting DetailsHi, while taking pictures of chemtrails in path of sun during sunset at 4:25 PM PST, latter while deleting and observing, spotted two orbs. One on left side of chemtrail next to sun. Then a non orb pix, then the orb on other side of sun. Very dramitic pix! Looks like a moon. Except moon was far behind me. I also sent in orange orb pictures in januaray 2012. These are very clear and large, camera picked up the orbs. Which hurt your eyes because of sun facing you. Guy, Whittier
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Alhambra
There were no other sightings in Alhambra on or around February 2nd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: taking chemtrail pictures , scanning found large white orb moved from left to right .
